description: Updates the contents of a Spark notebook.

parameters.name: NotebookId
parameters.description: The ID of the notebook to update.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: The updated content for the notebook.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The notebook content type. Currently, the only valid type is IPYNB.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive string used to ensure the request to create the notebook is idempotent (executes only once).
